      • addUser

        @RequestMapping(value="form_user.htm",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addUser(Client cli)
        Parameters:
        cli - this param receives a client object from adduser method, that allows create a new user.
        Returns:
        this method return a ModelAndView object with all info about the user and specify the page to go in.
